page.title: 11COMPUTERS AT DENBURY SCHOOL
page.content: Two years ago our school got a new computer.We used to have a{ZX81,}but now we have a{BBC 'B'.}We use quite a lot of different programs on the computer.We have some Adventure Games like{Spacex}and{Flowers of Crystal which we use in our language work. We have borrowed a floor turtle which is a sort of dome shaped robot on wheels controlled by computer using LOGO. The turtle has a pen so we can make big copies of the patterns drawn on the screen. The{Domesday Project}has given us the chance to use our computer to store information.We have some arcade games like{Pedro}to use for fun on wet days. 19 children out of 29 in our class have computers of their own at home. { Ryan Leslie { Age 10
